    • trackData

      public static java.lang.Object trackData​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object value)
      Tracks a variable in the debug data table with name. Set value to the variable you want to track.
      Parameters:
      name -
      value -
      Returns:
      the value found in the data table (including ones set by the user.) Supports Integer, Double, Float, String, Vector2, and Vector3.
